title: Coconut Estates For Sale in Gampaha District
details:
1, 3,10,15 and 20 acres coconut lands and estates for sale in Gampaha District.
Clear deeds.
Monthly 1000, 4000 and 10000 coconuts crop. It's depend on usage of pertilize and rainfall.
If you interest to more information,please call our real estate agent Mr. C. Polgampala on 0772 958 658
